during his performance, pinocchio gets hurt and is thrown into the sea, where he instantly returns to normal and is swallowed by a giant shark which coincidentally has also swallowed geppetto. They escape together.
pinocchio takes geppetto to a farm to help him recover by helping out a farmer to get his father better.
inside the farmer's paddock, pinocchio sees a sick donkey who he immediately recognizes as lucignolo, but his friend tragically dies from working too hard.
rewarding his efforts to strive for moral prudence, the blue fairy transforms him into a real boy.
with his wish granted, he and his father see his old puppet body in the corner of the house, and he sets off his actual first day of school.
